topic.title: סַנְהֶדְרִין Sanhedrin is the Jewish court(like Sharia in Islam) All Gentile(Non-Jewish) men should be killed it they do not accept Talmudic Jewish jurisdiction, only women should be left. Especially all men from Iran, Iraq and Turkey should be killed. All Christian and Muslim men should be killed if they persist in their religion and do not   follow Jewish Law. (according to Rabbi Yisrael Ariel, Head of Sanhedrin and The Temple Institute in Jerusalem)
topic.body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9edV7ta-r-Y
All Gentile men should be killed it they do not accept Talmudic Jewish jurisdiction, only women should be left.
Especially all men from Iran, Iraq and Turkey should be killed.
All Christian and Muslim men should be killed if they persist in their religion and do not follow Jewish Law. 
If you catch [US President] Obama on the street and you know that he does not follow Jewish Law (You are commanded to kill him.)
(From the English subtitled audio recording of Rabbi Yisrael Ariel, Head of The Sanhedrin and The Temple Institute speaking in Jerusalem on 9 September 2015 about how Jews should treat non-Jews.)
Sanhedrin is the Jewish court(like Sharia in Islam) 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sanhedrin
